A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I see many people giving the movie hate. I feel that hate is unwarranted because something happened that they didn't like. It's hard to explain this without spoilers but I loved this movie! Some very interesting turn of events happen\, and some great moments. Quite impressed! I honestly wish Rian would direct Episode 9 so he can continue with his ideas! I feel that JJ will try and change some of what Rian did. All in all would definitely recommend watching and soon to avoid spoilers!
